name: Lil Volt
description:
This is a game made for the Minimalistic Jam 2.

It's a platform game. You are a battery, your objective is to gather energy (yellow bar) to save your father.

Move using: W,S,A,D
Jump using: J
Dash using: H

Credits:

Aaron Ishibashi - http://aishibashimusic.com/
